ygData.msgSnippet: Adrax takes several of the blasts, but begins to manuver around the sky. he transforms into Warrior Mode, and continues to fire his gattling gun. Megatron,

    Adrax takes several of the blasts, but begins to manuver around the sky. 
he transforms into Warrior Mode, and continues to fire his gattling gun.
    "Megatron, your minions are as good as dead!" He said, still fireing and 
avoiding fire. He still regretted being in this small form, but if he could 
manuver around the blasts he might have a chance to take them out.
    Adrax looked at the ship. He hoped Rampage and the others would come out 
and give them a hand. And why werent the Auto-guns online and fireing? This 
was very mysterious....
